name: Approximately Hockey
description:
Created for a local game jam, where the theme was "Extreme Sports."

Each player controls two hockey dudes who try to shoot a giant puck into a small goal. There are barely any rules, except whoever gets the most points wins.

Also you get points by knocking out your opponents, with the puck or otherwise.

The lack of sound effects is made up for with gratuitous screen shake.

This project was assembled in about a day and a half, and it may be updated at some point to include more features.

Here are the controls (note that Xbox layout controllers on Windows work best):

ActionKeyboardControllersMove 1WASDLeft Stick
(X & Y Axes)Sprint 1Left ShiftA or L Stick Click
(Button 1 or 9)
Shoot 1Tab
L CtrlB or L Bumper
(Button 2 or 5)
Move 2ArrowsRight Stick
(4th & 5th Axes)Sprint 2Right ShiftA or R Stick Click
(Button 1 or 10)
Shoot 2R CtrlB or R Bumper
(Button 2 or 6)
